import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AdminSidebar from '../AdminSidebar' export default function CreateMaincategory() { let name = useRef("") let [message, setMessage] = useState("") let [show, setShow] = useState(false) function getInputData(e){ name.current = e.target.value } function postData(e){ e.preventDefault() if(name.length==0){ setShow(true) setMessage("Maincategory Name Must Required") } el } return ( <> {/* */}
